title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 6, ch. X, subch. A, art. 1, pt. 660 - Tidal Wetlands-moratorium Permits
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 6, ch. X, subch. A, art. 1, pt. 660 - Tidal Wetlands-moratorium Permits

State Regulations
§ 660.1 - Definitions
§ 660.2 - Moratorium permit required
§ 660.3 - Petition for moratorium permit; determinations of non-applicability
§ 660.4 - Publication of notice of petition
§ 660.5 - Standards for the issuance of a moratorium permit; burden of proof
§ 660.6 - Public hearing
§ 660.7 - Issuance or denial of moratorium permit
§ 660.8 - Mandatory conditions of moratorium permit
§ 660.9 - Notice of determination and record of proceedings
§ 660.10 - Extension of expiration date
§ 660.11 - Modification of permit
§ 660.12 - Revocation or suspension of moratorium permit
§ 660.13 - Joint proceedings under other laws and regulations

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 6, ch. X, subch. A, art. 1, pt. 660

Statutory authority: Environmental Conservation Law, §§1-0101, 3-0301, 25-0202

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
